remarks: Express the product of two metrics as another metric.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
statement:
tmsxps.p $e |- P = ( dist ` ( ( toMetSp ` M ) Xs. ( toMetSp ` N ) ) ) $.
tmsxps.1 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( *Met ` X ) ) $.
tmsxps.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( *Met ` Y ) ) $.
tmsxpsmopn.j $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` M ) $.
tmsxpsmopn.k $e |- K = ( MetOpen ` N ) $.
tmsxpsmopn.l $e |- L = ( MetOpen ` P ) $.
tmsxpsmopn $p |- ( ph -> L = ( J tX K ) ) $.
